solution_line_template: If each spoonful contains {clusters_per_spoonful} clusters of oats, and each bowl of cereal has {spoonfuls_per_bowl} spoonfuls, then in each bowl there are {clusters_per_spoonful}*{spoonfuls_per_bowl}=<<{clusters_per_spoonful}*{spoonfuls_per_bowl}={clusters_per_bowl}>>{clusters_per_bowl} clusters of oats.

And If each box of cereal contains {clusters_per_box} clusters of oats, then there are {clusters_per_box}/{clusters_per_bowl}=<<{clusters_per_box}/{clusters_per_bowl}={bowlfuls_per_box}>>{bowlfuls_per_box} bowlfuls of cereal in every box.
